title: OAT Optometry Admission Test
description:
OAT Exam Preparation, OAT Video Crash Courses, OAT Practice Tests, OAT Questions, OAT Resources and more! Want to Get Accepted into Optometry School? 'Crack the OAT' helps you score higher and save study time for your Optometry Admission Test. Admissions into Optometry School have become more competitive than ever before; therefore, scoring high on your OAT Exam is extremely important to stand out against other pre-optometry applicants. Since 2005, we've helped thousands and thousands of pre-optometry students get accepted into top optometry schools. And we can't wait to equip you with the ammo you need to be combat, defeat and be successful on your Optometry Admission Test and outshine your competition fighting for your spot in optometry school.

Get started today with the CrackOAT to receive and gain all these great benefits:

1) Learn from 100+ Hours of OAT Crash Course Videos and Explanations to help you learn, save study time and score higher 
• Absorb commonly tested facts and concepts through over 100+ Hours of detailed OAT Video Explanations to newly released OAT Exam Questions
• Watch & Learn from our Video Crash Courses to help you master the OAT:
     + On-Demand Video Crash Course for General Chemistry and Organic Chemistry Subjects 
     + On-Demand Video Crash Course for Reading Comprehension
     + On-Demand Video Crash Course for Math & Quantitative Reasoning

2) Simulate the Optometry Admission Test with newly released OAT Questions
• Take full length diagnostic tests of the Optometry Admission Test under actual testing conditions
• Sharpen your test taking skills, perfect your time management, enhance your accuracy, boost your confidence and increase your OAT scores.

3) Largest Arsenal of Optometry Admission Tests (over 3000 Questions & Video Explanations)
• Prepare and Rehearse for the Optometry Admission Test before you get to the test center. The actual test will then be a cakewalk for you. You'll be able to take a full diagnostic test as well as tackle:
-> 10 Full Length Optometry Admission Tests
-> 20 OAT Natural Science Exams consisting of 2000 Questions with Video Explanations
-> 10 OAT Reading Comprehension Exams consisting of 500 Questions with Explanations
-> 10 OAT Physics Tests consisting of 400 Questions with Video Explanations
-> 25 OAT Quantitative Reasoning Exams; 1000 Questions with Video Explanations + 500 Bonus Math Questions!

4) Improve your test skills
• Sharpen and hone your time management, confidence and accuracy for your Optometry Admission Test Exam
• Access our recommended OAT Study Schedule (4 Week Plan, 8 Week Plan, 12 Week Plan)
• Access our "Crack Notes" - Cram Sheets for the Biology, General Chemistry, Organic Chemistry and Math subjects to help you master and ace these sections!
• Improve your Optometry Admission Test scores instantly

5) Estimate your Optometry Admission Test scores
• Predict and estimate your Optometry Admission Test scores 
• Receive your estimated Optometry Admission Test Scores after each test
• See how you perform in relation to other students

6) Pinpoint your weaknesses
• Generate comprehensive analysis reports to find areas where you can improve your Optometry Admission Test scores

7) Receive Automatic updates
• Yay! You'll never be left with an outdated version

8) Access Anytime Anywhere
• Study on the go to help you increase your OAT scores!

9) Optometry Admission Test Pass Guarantee
• Heart us after you conquer your Optometry Admission Test and get accepted into optometry school!
